name: ALSystemUtilities
tagline: This library provides a list of 80 methods to get every kind of system information!
body:
### Useful
The library is useful to check and get every kind of information about the device.
You can embed in in every project, it is very light!

### Updated
The framework is updated every time Apple presents new products, so you are always up-to-date with the informations about the hardware and battery.

### Author
Andrea Mario Lufino. I'm an iOS developer since 2011. Check my website [here](http://about.aliosdev.com).

### Support or Contact
Having troubles, want to suggest feature or something? Send me an email at andrea.lufino@me.com!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
